Title: Provides that chiropractors may perform certain services including certifying disability
Summary: Provides that chiropractors may certify disability for handicapped parking and real property tax purposes and be employed by school districts to assist medical inspectors.
LawCode: Amd ยง459, RPT L; amd ยง404-a, V & T L; amd ยง902, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to enabling chiropractors to certify disability; to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to enabling chiropractors to certify disability for the purpose of issuance of handicapped license plates and registration; and to amend the education law, in relation to enabling chiropractors to be employed by school districts to provide school health services
